biography_text: SMUCKER, Lloyd K., a Representative from Pennsylvania; born in Lancaster, Lancaster County, Pa., January 23, 1964; attended Lebanon Valley College, Annville, Pa.; attended Franklin & Marshall College, Lancaster, Pa., 1988-1991; business owner; member of the West Lampeter, Pa., planning commission, 2001-2005; member of the West Lampeter, Pa., township board of supervisors, 2005-2009; member of the Pennsylvania state senate, 2009-2016; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress (January 3, 2017-present).
